piece.description: A story about wishes and miracles... Kamihama and Mitakihara, past and future, hope and despair...and salvation. Many encounters, many paths of fate. The connection they form creates another story.

shopItemList.name: A Different Story
shopItemList.description: メモリア『もうひとつのストーリー』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

piece.description: My friends invited me here, but I had no idea there was a little space like this, warm with sunlight and so pretty! All the Mitakihara girls will be here soon. Let's both go greet them!

shopItemList.name: Madoka & Homura's Brief Respite
shopItemList.description: Already at Max Level and fully Ascended

piece.description: We just happened to stumble on this perfect little place! With deliciously made tea and snacks, it transforms into a perfect spot for a break! It's too wonderful here to not share with all our friends.

shopItemList.name: Iroha & Yachiyo's Brief Respite
shopItemList.description: Already at Max Level and fully Ascended

pieceSkill.name: Curse Chip Adept [II]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Curse Chip (CC) Gain UP [II] (Affects CC dropped in quests, no effect when equipped as Support)

pieceSkill2.name: Curse Chip Adept [II]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Curse Chip (CC) Gain UP [II] (Affects CC dropped in quests, no effect when equipped as Support)

piece.description: 毎日を楽しく過ごすために大事なのは、何よりも笑顔！＠笑顔が笑顔を呼べば、その輪はどんどん広がっていくはず！＠だから、今日も元気に笑顔で「いらっしゃいませー！」＠（ローソンコラボ記念）

shopItemList.name: みんなに笑顔を！
shopItemList.description: メモリア『みんなに笑顔を！』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

pieceSkill.name: マナガイザー[Ⅲ]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: HP Regen [III] / Magia Damage UP [III] (Self/3 Turns)

pieceSkill2.name: マナガイザー[Ⅲ]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: HP Regen [III] / Magia Damage UP [III] (Self/3 Turns)

piece.description: 見えているところなんてほんの少し　＠どこでも時間は刻まれているし　誰かがその時間の中を歩んでいる＠その歩んだ足跡の形は　通り過ぎる空気の香りは　見える背中は＠きっと綺麗になじんで　素敵な虹色をしている（コミック発売記念）

shopItemList.name: 色とりどりの私たち
shopItemList.description: メモリア『色とりどりの私たち』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

pieceSkill.name: レジストライズ・サークル[Ⅱ]

pieceSkill2.name: レジストライズ・サークル[Ⅱ]

piece.description: どうやったら幸せになれる？どうやったら笑顔になれる？＠歌じゃダメ？ダンスでもダメ？それなら私たちに任せておいて＠槍に弓矢に銃器まで、色んなものに祈りを込めて＠あなたに魔法をかけるから。（マギレポ２・100回記念）

shopItemList.name: カミハ☆マギカ
shopItemList.description: メモリア『カミハ☆マギカ』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

piece.pieceName: 変わらず賑やかなお隣さん

pieceSkill.name: オーバーカム・アデプト[Ⅲ]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: ATK UP [III] / Get More MP when Hit by Weak Element [II]

pieceSkill2.name: オーバーカム・アデプト[Ⅲ]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: ATK UP [III] / Get More MP when Hit by Weak Element [II]

piece.description: 端末を手に持って、準備が出来たら『TOUCH SCREEN』＠タイトルの新着情報を案内するのは、リリースからの初日組＠同じ時間を走る不思議な世界でガチャ運に苦しんだりしながらも＠フレッシュな情報を毎回お届けします♪（コミック発売記念）

shopItemList.name: 変わらず賑やかなお隣さん
shopItemList.description: メモリア『変わらず賑やかなお隣さん』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

piece.pieceName: The First Step Into a Story
piece.description: A girl had forgotten the hope she had wished for, and met new people in an unfamiliar neighborhood. New fates were woven, and she recovered her memories to start anew. Thus, her story begins here.

shopItemList.name: The First Step Into a Story
shopItemList.description: メモリア『物語が始まる一歩』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

piece.description: They're from a fun-filled world full of kindness that bumps up against this one! They scoop up events, both big and small, that happen on the other side of the screen, and introduce them to everyone in their wild, freewheeling way! Ready, everyone? Magi-Magi-Magia Record!♪

shopItemList.name: Our Lively Neighbors
shopItemList.description: メモリア『賑やかなお隣さん』(Lv最大/最大限界突破済)

chara.name: Iroha Tamaki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Iroha came to Kamihama to investigate strange dreams she was having. Kind-hearted, she tends to worry too much about others. She's not up on the latest trends and isn't good with her phone. Usually reserved, she can be a fighter when it matters most.

charaMessageList.message: Is this what people call...bonds?

How long...since we've eaten out
as a family?

I lied to myself...
I didn't want them to dislike me.
Welcome back. I've been waiting for you.

I'm only interfering because you're so
precious to me!
I'm sorry... Your big sis is actually...

A little bitter… This taste brings back
such good memories.
Good thing I didn't give up!
I had faith that we'd be okay.
Your big sis did it!
Have I become a strong big sis?

shopItemList.name: Iroha's Magia Report Converter
shopItemList.description: Changes Iroha into her Magia Report self

chara.name: Yachiyo Nanami

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A seasoned Magical Girl who has fought Witches for 7 years in Kamihama. Yachiyo is well informed about the city and Magical Girls in general. She keeps her distance from other Magical Girls while she compiles files on the Rumors of Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message:
I hope you learned your lesson
and won't do it again.
I don't see my donut. Where is it?
All right. I accept your challenge.
We Magical Girls must not harm each other.
Listen. We are on the same side...
Life as a Magical Girl isn't easy.

I will protect everyone
no matter what happens.
I survived again...
Well, that ended okay.
I will not die! Not here!
I will protect you... I promise.

shopItemList.name: Yachiyo's Magia Report Converter
shopItemList.description: Changes Yachiyo into her Magia Report self

chara.name: Tsuruno Yui

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A reckless Magical Girl who's full of energy. Tsuruno loves her family, especially her grandfather and great-grandfather, who lead the Yuis to their former prosperity. She fights to become the strongest Magical Girl in order to restore the Yui name.

charaMessageList.message:
But I wanted to train harde
and become even mightier!
We all start out with equal strength!

If you're strong enough,
ANYTHING is possible!

Impulsive? Reckless?
What does that even mean?!
Ugh... I got yelled at… Again!
Yay! I'm the Mightiest Magical Girl!
Yeah! YEAH! This is what I call training!
I feel like I'm getting even more powerful!
I'm telling ya! I can't lose!
This proves how mighty I REALLY am!
Ya gotta admit it! Right now I am the mightiest!

shopItemList.name: Tsuruno's Magia Report Converter
shopItemList.description: Changes Tsuruno into her Magia Report self

chara.name: Sana Futaba

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A pessimistic Magical Girl, Sana was rejected by her family and those around her, so she has hardly any self-confidence. However, she'll quietly stand by the people who need her, ready to help them when the time comes.

charaMessageList.message: Am I far away? Or is it something else?
Cats' eyes are so clear and pretty!
Oh, please don't mind me...
The scenery around me seems kind of hazy.
It's not that I like being alone...
Why was I even born?
I wonder what Iroha's doing now...
I'm so glad... We're alive...
Huh? Really? We won?
Whew... I think we got lucky.
Um... Am I...strong?

shopItemList.name: Sana's Magia Report Converter
shopItemList.description: Changes Sana into her Magia Report self

chara.name: Felicia Mitsuki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Felicia is a spirited Magical Girl, full of energy and determination, who hates Witches for taking the lives of her parents. She now works as a mercenary, hunting Witches all across Kamihama. Her tough talk hides a kind heart and a love of animals.

charaMessageList.message: Hey, you! Wanna hire me?
UGH! Annoying stuff is so lame!
Don't sweat it! I don't ask for much.
My style? I go BAM, enemies go SPLAT!
Leave 'em to me! I'm super duper strong!
Don't hurt yourself! Need some help?
I'll wipe 'em out all by myself!
Yay! I won!
Ha! That's no way to fight!
Yep. Turned out exactly as you'd expect.
Lose? What does that even mean?

shopItemList.name: Felicia's Magia Report Converter
shopItemList.description: Changes Felicia into her Magia Report self

chara.name: Madoka Kaname

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

maxSaleItem.name: Destiny Crystal
maxSaleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for a Magical Girl

chara.description: A Magical Girl with extraordinary potential who lives in Mitakihara with her parents and younger brother. Gentle and caring, she is always surrounded by friends. She uses a bow and arrow in battle.

charaMessageList.message: Hmmm... Which ribbon should I wear?

I don't know much about this city...
It sure is strange, though...
I'm a Magical Girl…so I have to do this!
Is this…real?
Were you the one who was calling me?
Don't tell anyone in class, okay?
If I'm awesome, it'll all work out!
Thank goodness...it looks like we've won!
We did it! Great!
Yes! Looking good!
Phew... We made it through somehow!

chara.description: A timid Magical Girl who wished to protect Madoka. She turns back time repeatedly in an attempt to prevent Madoka from becoming a Witch. Now she searches for a new hope in Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message: I... I want to redo my meeting with Madoka!
I want to be someone who can protect her...
Where am I? What is this place...
I'll never, ever give up!
Which weapon should I use this time?
Let's do our best together from now on!
I'll save Madoka for sure this time!
I did it? I did it!
Phew...it's over now...
I got through it...somehow...
Did I fight well…?

She looks up to her Magical Girl senpai, Mami, and her fighting style of mass-conjuring weapons resembles hers. She used to visit her childhood friend Kyosuke in the hospital often.

charaMessageList.message: Never thought I'd be doing detective work!

I can't believe we're going to hang out
together again! Am I dreaming?

I wonder if I'll be able to find some
rare CDs in Kamihama.

To think there were so many
Magical Girls out there!
Why did it have to be us?

Alright, time to kill myself some
Witches today!

Magic really exists, and miracles
really do happen.
Case closed, I guess!
Sheesh, that was cutting it close!
Is it okay to praise myself for that?
I almost dozed off from sheer boredom there!

Believe in yourself and fight.
The rest will follow.
Shall we have a tea break?
Being a Magical Girl is no walk in the park.

What dream do you intend to
make a reality?
What's going on in in this city…?
Oh… Could you beat me on equal footing?
One job done.

Naive Magical Girls get killed quick.
...Well, a free meal's a free meal.
I'm gonna survive no matter what.
I can't just ignore idiots like that.
If ya get it, then don't be a dumbass.
Substance over style, that's me.
I'll take the win, thanks!
Well that went well!
Now then. What to eat?
They're gonna feel that one!

chara.description: A timid Magical Girl who wished to protect Madoka. She turns back time repeatedly in an attempt to prevent Madoka from becoming a Witch. Now she searches for a new hope in Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message: I... I want to redo my meeting with Madoka!
I want to be someone who can protect her...
Where am I? What is this place...
I'll never, ever give up!
Which weapon should I use this time?
Let's do our best together from now on!
I'll save Madoka for sure this time!
I did it? I did it!
Phew...it's over now...
I got through it...somehow...
Did I fight well…?

shopItemList.name: Homura Akemi (Glasses)
shopItemList.description: Get a Destiny Gem when you have this Magical Girl

item.name: Fate Weave Ticket
item.description: Used to draw a 1x Fate Weave

shopItemList.name: Fate Weave Ticket
shopItemList.description: Fate Weave Ticket

piece.description: (Memoria Enhancement Material) There is no longer any way to regain what is lost. Memories lose their shape and form with time, crumbling into pieces. Those memories, scattered from the palm of your hand, will pile up anew in your heart just like snow on a silent night.

shopItemList.name: Memoria Circuit Core
shopItemList.description: Used to Enhance Memoria

chara.name: Iroha Tamaki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Iroha came to Kamihama to investigate strange dreams she was having. Kind-hearted, she tends to worry too much about others. She's not up on the latest trends and isn't good with her phone. Usually reserved, she can be a fighter when it matters most.

charaMessageList.message: Is this what people call...bonds?

How long...since we've eaten out
as a family?

I lied to myself...
I didn't want them to dislike me.
Welcome back. I've been waiting for you.

I'm only interfering because you're so
precious to me!
I'm sorry... Your big sis is actually...

A little bitter… This taste brings back
such good memories.
Good thing I didn't give up!
I had faith that we'd be okay.
Your big sis did it!
Have I become a strong big sis?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Iroha Tamaki's Magic

chara.name: Yachiyo Nanami

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A seasoned Magical Girl who has fought Witches for 7 years in Kamihama. Yachiyo is well informed about the city and Magical Girls in general. She keeps her distance from other Magical Girls while she compiles files on the Rumors of Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message:
I hope you learned your lesson
and won't do it again.
I don't see my donut. Where is it?
All right. I accept your challenge.
We Magical Girls must not harm each other.
Listen. We are on the same side...
Life as a Magical Girl isn't easy.

I will protect everyone
no matter what happens.
I survived again...
Well, that ended okay.
I will not die! Not here!
I will protect you... I promise.

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Yachiyo Nanami's Magic

chara.name: Tsuruno Yui

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A reckless Magical Girl who's full of energy. Tsuruno loves her family, especially her grandfather and great-grandfather, who lead the Yuis to their former prosperity. She fights to become the strongest Magical Girl in order to restore the Yui name.

charaMessageList.message:
But I wanted to train harde
and become even mightier!
We all start out with equal strength!

If you're strong enough,
ANYTHING is possible!

Impulsive? Reckless?
What does that even mean?!
Ugh... I got yelled at… Again!
Yay! I'm the Mightiest Magical Girl!
Yeah! YEAH! This is what I call training!
I feel like I'm getting even more powerful!
I'm telling ya! I can't lose!
This proves how mighty I REALLY am!
Ya gotta admit it! Right now I am the mightiest!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Tsuruno Yui's Magic

chara.name: Kaede Akino

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A worrywart, Kaede is easily scared. She is also kind, caring, and ready to take risks for her friends. She loves animals, plants, and insects, and nature in general. She enjoys gardening, and though she's not good at them, she likes UFO Catchers.

charaMessageList.message: Why did I agree to become a Magical Girl?
This way! W-wait! No, this way!
That's so m-mean! Um...I...I'm sorry...
I want to be your teammate again...!
I keep holding them back...
Oh, no! I spent 5,000 yen on this...
Huh? Oh, wh-what should I do?!
I won...right?
What a relief…
Wow! Amazing!
I…I can do it too!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Kaede Akino's Magic

chara.name: Asuka Tatsuki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: An assistant Naginata instructor at the Ryushinkan Dojo and Magical Girl. As the only child of the Dojo Master, she trains hard every day. She is disciplined, but also absentminded, and that absentmindedness can get her into trouble.

charaMessageList.message:
Oof!
This is Asuka Tatsuki's worst blunder ever!

I-I'm going to kill myself!
Don't try to stop me!
I regret nothing!
I have no choice but to use my last resort!
I will not run...or hide...or disappear!
Stop toying with me!

If I give up now,
it'd be a disgrace to Ryushin-ryu!
Victory is mine!
This is the way of Ryushin-ryu!
Never let your guard down, even after victory!
We won! Let me hear a triumphant cheer!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Asuka Tatsuki's Magic

chara.name: Homura Akemi
chara.title: Glasses

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A timid Magical Girl who wished to protect Madoka. She turns back time repeatedly in an attempt to prevent Madoka from becoming a Witch. Now she searches for a new hope in Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message: I... I want to redo my meeting with Madoka!
I want to be someone who can protect her...
Where am I? What is this place...
I'll never, ever give up!
Which weapon should I use this time?
Let's do our best together from now on!
I'll save Madoka for sure this time!
I did it? I did it!
Phew...it's over now...
I got through it...somehow...
Did I fight well…?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Homura Akemi (Glasses)'s Magic

chara.name: Kanoko Yayoi

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who wants to become a fashion designer. The only child of a family that runs a sheet metal plant, her parents' expectations that she will take over the business stress her out. Although she gets strange looks, she is always serious.

charaMessageList.message: Magical Girl, Boy, I'll become either!
I trust my instincts!
Dad...Mom...I'm sorry!
I wanna be a fashion designer!
I'm not giving up on my dream yet!

Is it okay for my life to
keep going this way…?
I want to walk my own runway!
I can't give up. Not now, not here!
As I calculated, we won!
Stylish win!
My victory is a sure bet!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Kanoko Yayoi's Magic

chara.name: Natsuki Utsuho

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: An enthusiastic supporter of everyone around her, there isn't a Magical Girl livelier than Natsuki. She is a huge fan of baseball, and as a cheerleader and the baseball team's manager, she's there for the team year-round.

charaMessageList.message: You can win for sure! I guarantee it!
I didn't just want to play baseball…
I always dreamed of fighting together.
Well, I'm not cheering for nothing.
If only things could stay like this forever…

I made up my mind!
I'm going to cheer for everyone's future!
Go for it! I'm cheering for all of you!
Don't forget to stretch after the game!
Nice play! Good work!
I gave it everything I got too!
Yeah! Let's win again!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Natsuki Utsuho's Magic

chara.name: Hinano Miyako

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: She may look young but Hinano is a seasoned Magical Girl. She has a mind for science and is president of the chemistry club. Although popular with the younger crowd, she is often made fun of for her childish stature. She strives to be more "mature."

charaMessageList.message:
Hehe...!
I thought of a good idea for the show!
Hey! Don't look down on me like that!
Potassium iodide...our special ingredient!
A social life? Blow it to pieces with ethanol!
Don't forget that I'm your senpai!

I'm going to bring you back from this
Labyrinth safe and sound.

It's time to start the
most exciting show around!
Yep, I'm satisfied!
This proves my hypothesis!
This is going to make for a great article!
The experiment was a huge success!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Hinano Miyako's Magic

chara.name: Sasara Minagi

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl with a strong sense of justice. As a kid, Sasara was obsessed with a knight in a picture book and swore to become someone who could save people too. Taking after her Rescue Squad father, she'd rather save a life than kill an enemy.

charaMessageList.message: Can I save people, like my dad?
I wanna be a knight like in that picture book.
My sword shall be used to protect.
Isn't it lonely being a Magical Girl?

Maybe I should become a member of the
rescue squad!

Is it because...
I want someone to thank me...?
I became a Magical Girl...no, a knight!
I'm gonna get even stronger!
I'm happy that I can protect everyone...!
I wish Dad could see me doing this.
This is the duty of a knight!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Sasara Minagi's Magic

chara.name: Nanaka Tokiwa

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl from the head family of Kashin-ryu, a school of flower arranging started in the Edo period (1603-1868). Beautiful and impeccable, she appears to be innocent, but she is actually a wise strategist, able to read any situation she is put into with ease.

charaMessageList.message: I'm not going to fall that easily... I promise...
I've been shouldering destiny my whole life.

You're the one who decides
what you do with your life.
May I ask you to help me, kindly?
I want to find that hidden truth...

Supreme simplicity...
the essence of Kashin style.

My path continues...
straight ahead of me!
Well, that's about it, I guess.
Now if you'll excuse me…
Let's put an end to this, shall we?
It'll be nice if next time goes the same way this time did.

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Nanaka Tokiwa's Magic

chara.name: Emiri Kisaki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Emiri strives to be the cutest Magical Girl on earth. She has a distinct way of talking, and likes to give everyone a special nickname. Extremely straightforward, Emiri is very easygoing. Somehow she can gain the trust of anyone in almost no time.

charaMessageList.message: Oh, man! This is like, real magic, isn't it?!
Take it easy! Everything's gonna be all right!
It's pretty cool, if ya ask me.

I'm gonna become the cutest
Magical Girl ever!

Just keep going!
Don't stop those positive vibes!
We should totally do this! It's fun!
Gimme some of that excitement!
Yay! We won!
I'm Just Getting Started!
Looking good!
I'm like super duper strong!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Emiri Kisaki's Magic

chara.name: Shizuku Hozumi

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who wanders about trying to find a place where she belongs. Unable to figure out what she likes, what she hopes to be, or even her own identity, she is always in a state of anxiety. Like the cafe her family runs, she is calm and quiet.

charaMessageList.message:
The ground beneath my feet
has never been stable.
Why do I feel this way...?
Do we share the same destiny?
What should I use this power for?
Is it okay for me to be here...?
Yachiyo, I'm sorry.
I have to find a place of my own.
I didn't even know what I was doing...
Yeah, I'm happy too.
How does my smile look?
Do I belong here like everyone else...?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Shizuku Hozumi's Magic

chara.name: Akira Shinobu

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who looks, talks, and acts like a boy. She was raised and trained alongside the boys at her father's karate dojo. Akira is known as "The Troubleshooter of Sankyoin," because she can't say no to someone in need.

charaMessageList.message: Am I overbearing?

I can't just walk away
from someone in need!

All right, let's start with a basic punch!
Hyaaa!
I got your request. Leave the rest to me!
I feel strangely uneasy about this...
I want to help in any way I can.
Inaction is cowardice!
Phew… We won this one!
Looks like a decisive defeat to me!
Sorry, but I'm gonna win this one!
Just like I imagined before the battle!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Akira Shinobu's Magic

chara.name: Manaka Kurumi

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who is a great chef just like her father. Manaka's family runs a cozy, old-school restaurant. Her cooking is second to none, and her irritating overconfidence is her only flaw. That said, she is just proud of her hard work and has no ill intentions.

charaMessageList.message:
My food is ten times better than
anyone else's!

Oooooh...
The scent of nice, melted cheese...
Voilà! Walnut's special rice omelet!

There is no doubt that Walnut's serves
the best dishes around.
Please...give it a try!!
Teach me the joy of cooking!
Magical flavor! Here you go!
It was obvious that this would be the outcome!
I'm gonna have a great meal after this!
How do you feel about a celebratory dessert?
A full-course dinner for the winner!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Manaka Kurumi's Magic

chara.name: Kako Natsume

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Kako is a bookworm and the only daughter of the family that runs Natsume Books, a used book store in Kamihama. Her mother is a Japanese teacher. Kako's a softy, never acting selfishly, but that doesn't mean she doesn't make herself completely clear when she has to.

charaMessageList.message: Ah...I can't wait to read the next chapter!
Dad! Can I borrow this book?
Truth is indeed stranger than fiction.
I just love used bookstores!
I need to stand firm, don't I?

The pile of books I want to read
just keeps growing…
I have to hold on to these dust jackets!
Phew. It looks like I won...
Looks like I managed to put an end to that…
To be continued, I would say!
Happily ever after!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Kako Natsume's Magic

chara.name: Meiyui Chun

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A kung fu master, Meiyui belongs to the Blue Seas Family. She left her parents in China and came to Japan alone. She is well-composed, but she lets that all go when it's time to protect her family and townspeople. She is an excellent Mahjong player.

charaMessageList.message:
The Blue Sea Family…
they are my everything.

The townspeople are like my family.
I must protect them.

I'll never forgive anyone who
endangers my family.
My fists are telling me to fight.
I wish I had time for a cup of tea.
Do I look like I'm joking?

Even in battle, one's heart must be
as peaceful as a meadow.
No problem.
That was an easy victory.
My fists did the winning.
I will protect the Blue Sea Family.

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Meiyui Chun's Magic

chara.name: Ayaka Mariko

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who used to be dark and pessimistic but is now bright and optimistic thanks to her wish. Unlike her old self, she has a positive attitude no matter what happens. However, beneath that smile, she sometimes feels guilty about her new, fake outlook on life.

charaMessageList.message: Don't worry! If you act, results will follow!
I was reborn back then…
No, I'm not that kind of person.
Hahaha! I laugh every time I hear that joke!

They say laughter is the key to happiness!
So let's laugh!

Check it out! My best one-liner!
Sushi roooooll!

Everything's gonna be all right!
Come on, smile! Smiiiiile!
Wooooo! I'm feeling so pumped!
Well, that went as expected!
It didn't work?! I thought it would, though!
We're on a roll! Let's do another!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Ayaka Mariko's Magic

chara.name: Masara Kagami

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: An almost emotionless Magical Girl, Masara was born into a peaceful family and raised by two loving parents. Despite all the love she was given, she remains cold, living a life lacking excitement. Deep inside, though, she is thirsty for something more.

charaMessageList.message:
I made an objective judgement.
No more, no less.

There's nothing to be gained from
spending time with me.
Did I protect myself? No, I protected her.
I don't like getting hurt either…

I have no interest in trying to live up to
others' expectations.
I find that unpleasant.
From here on, call me. No matter what.
How does it feel? Glad you won?
The correct response to this is joy, right?
I'm glad I managed to protect you.
How do I express these feelings…?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Masara Kagami's Magic

chara.name: Konomi Haruna

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who loves flowers and works at a flower shop. Konomi is kind and works hard for the shop owner, who she respects. She is a great worker, but can at times get distracted by her love of flowers. She is talented at flower arrangement.

charaMessageList.message: Here! A flower gift for you!

There's a rumor about a Ghost Flower Girl?
T-tell me about it...

But it's such a nice gesture
to give someone a flower…
I've got a wonderful idea!

Ever since that day...
I've been fascinated with flowers.
A flower cake...sounds wonderful...!

How about giving flowers to someone
you care about?
Because of you, I'm able to work with a big smile!
How about a...celebration bouquet?
Everyone's smile is in full bloom!
I want to give everyone a bouquet...!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Konomi Haruna's Magic

chara.name: Rika Ayano

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who is into the latest fashion and make-up. Rika appears to be a typical girly girl, but she is actually very seriously in love. She has been secretly admiring the same person for years. A genuine person, she gets along with everyone.

charaMessageList.message:
Ugh! I'm gonna release some stress
by taking out a Witch!
A guy that sweet...it should be illegal...

It's just right for the princess and the prince
to be together!

I had to go and ask that little white fuzzball
for that wish.
I came here to meet my Prince Charming!

What's wrong with being different?
Is it that bad?

You know, nothing good comes out
of desperation!
Gotcha! I won!
Did you see that? I was amazing!
Yup, yup! Big round of applause for everyone!
I'm a loveable Magical Girl!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Rika Ayano's Magic

chara.name: Oriko Mikuni

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A blue-blooded Magical Girl whose father is an ex-parliament member. Oriko does whatever it takes to get the job done, but her strong sense of justice, inherited from her father, keeps her from overdoing it. She is refined and loves drinking tea at home.

charaMessageList.message:
Do I see some disturbances
in my path ahead?

This is a future I've never seen before...
what is this?

No matter what path we take,
we end up in the same place.
I know exactly what I have to do!
You shall serve and protect me forever!

Everyone only sees me as Hisaomi Mikuni's
daughter, and nothing else…

There is only one thing to do...
Eliminate Madoka Kaname.
Checkmate.
Still have your will to resist?
Repent!
Would you like to be my pawn too?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Oriko Mikuni's Magic

chara.name: Yuma Chitose

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A young Magical Girl who is very attached to Kyoko, Yuma sees her as her sister, and is willing to do anything for her. Although she is an innocent child, she was abused badly, and experiences terror much more distinctly than others, due to that trauma.

charaMessageList.message:
Just like Kyubey said,
I became a Magical Girl!
Please… Don't leave me…
I can use healing magic!
If Kyoko gets hurt, I'll make her better!

I want to become a Magical Girl
and fight, too!
I became a Magical Girl for Kyoko.
I can be useful too!
I won? Yay!
Tell me how good a girl I am!
I can fight too!
See? I'm helpful!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Yuma Chitose's Magic

chara.name: Felicia Mitsuki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Felicia is a spirited Magical Girl, full of energy and determination, who hates Witches for taking the lives of her parents. She now works as a mercenary, hunting Witches all across Kamihama. Her tough talk hides a kind heart and a love of animals.

charaMessageList.message: Hey, you! Wanna hire me?
UGH! Annoying stuff is so lame!
Don't sweat it! I don't ask for much.
My style? I go BAM, enemies go SPLAT!
Leave 'em to me! I'm super duper strong!
Don't hurt yourself! Need some help?
I'll wipe 'em out all by myself!
Yay! I won!
Ha! That's no way to fight!
Yep. Turned out exactly as you'd expect.
Lose? What does that even mean?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Felicia Mitsuki's Magic

chara.name: Hazuki Yusa

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl raised in an orphanage. The Azalea House took her in after an accident on a family trip claimed her parents. Despite her tragic childhood, her personality is bright and cheery, and she's talented at getting along with others.

charaMessageList.message: I'm the chef in this house.

Hey, it's just me.
No need to have your guard up.
Hey now, relax those shoulders, okay?
We just want to keep on living here.
I just want to drift around, like a jellyfish.
We're still family, no matter what.
There's all sorts of fun things worth living for.
And...finished! Cool, time to withdraw!
Come on, I couldn't possibly afford to lose.
Yes! We won! Things are looking good.
Sorry, we can't stop now.

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Hazuki Yusa's Magic

chara.name: Sana Futaba

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A pessimistic Magical Girl, Sana was rejected by her family and those around her, so she has hardly any self-confidence. However, she'll quietly stand by the people who need her, ready to help them when the time comes.

charaMessageList.message: Am I far away? Or is it something else?
Cats' eyes are so clear and pretty!
Oh, please don't mind me...
The scenery around me seems kind of hazy.
It's not that I like being alone...
Why was I even born?
I wonder what Iroha's doing now...
I'm so glad... We're alive...
Huh? Really? We won?
Whew... I think we got lucky.
Um... Am I...strong?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Sana Futaba's Magic

chara.name: Aimi Eri

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who lives for love and romance. Even though she's had the same crush for so long, she still gets too embarrassed to talk when she sees him. Her greatest secret? A notebook of fantasies where she tells him her feelings and date night plans.

charaMessageList.message: Oh when will my love bear fruit?
I will NOT die with my love still unrequited!
What are you doing to my beloved?!
U-ummm, I...haha, you know, I...uh...
What do I do now?! Seriously, tell me!
Nooo problem! We're just getting started!
Do you think he's like...o.m.g. Like, O.M.G!
Alright, see you around!
I can't keep my beloved waiting!
Can you feel the power of a woman in love?
Life's short! So go fall in love, girls!

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Aimi Eri's Magic

chara.name: Kaoru Maki

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl from Asunaro City. She's a soccer player who is so good that people often say she will be the best player on the national team. She is great at using her athleticism to her advantage in battle. She wears a long-sleeved uniform even in summer.

charaMessageList.message: Heck yeaaah! Nice shot!
I wear long sleeves in summer, too!
Kazumi...Umika? Where'd they go?
Oh, me? I'm a soccer player.
Can't win unless you make your shots!
I won't miss... This is the best shot ever!
I can't stop...not at a time like this!
The game's over, fair and square!
This is a big win for us!
What an intense battle!
We won...but there's a lot more work to do.

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Kaoru Maki's Magic

chara.name: Tsukasa Amane

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: Tsukuyo's twin sister, Tsukasa hopes to liberate Magical Girls. Born into a family of traditional bamboo craftsmen, she runs the household to support her father and his apprentices. Though she is cheerful and has many friends, Tsukuyo is the only one she can open up to.

charaMessageList.message: You, you're my sister?
Dad, how could you hide this from me?
Who is that? She looks just like me.

Being happy and energetic
makes other people happy!
I never want to hate Tsukuyo...
Sorry, everyone! I'm going shopping now!
Um, am I really an only child?
Great job, everyone!
It's all thanks to the smiles!
Our performance is over. Thank you very much!
You don't need an encore, right?

shopItemList.name: Destiny Gem
shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Tsukasa Amane's Magic

chara.description: A Magical Girl who lives in an apartment complex in Daito Ward, Leila is cheerful, considerate, and treats everyone with kindness, so people are naturally drawn to her. But her desire to get along with others can sometimes lead to her being taken advantage of.

charaMessageList.message: I just want everyone to get along.
I'll never let go of your hands.
I can still fight if you two are with me!
I love Kamihama. And our home, too!
I baked cookies for us to eat together!
We just need to move forward!
Did I put too much sugar in this cake?
Let's keep it going!
Pheeew! It all turned out a-okay!
Yes! I could tell we'd win!
I think we finished it off nicely!

shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Leila Ibuki's Magic

chara.name: Ria Ami

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who moonlights as a fashion model. Often dubbed one of Kamihama's foremost beauties, she can't stand the thought of not having the spotlight, so she always puts herself at the front of anything she's involved in. She acts confident, but from a bystander's perspective she's a little incompetent.

charaMessageList.message: Ahh... No one can take their eyes off me!

Hmph! Give me a huge serving of
rice omelet, please!
Beautiful, even in battle! Words I live by!
No one can ever find out about my past.

It seems I must recognize you
as a rival of mine!
Y-Y-Y-Y-Yachiyo Nanami! Halt this instant!!!

I am Ria Ami!
My beauty even makes flowers bloom!
We fought beautifully!
My magnificent magnetism!
As in beauty, perfection!!!
More fans have flocked to me, no?

shopItemList.description: Used to Unlock Ria Ami's Magic

chara.name: Chisato Shion

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: One in a team of 4 Magical Girls who attend school at Akanegazaki. Levelheaded and calm, she values being ethical above all else. While she may come off as cold, she has a caring side for her friends, having reformed Arisa's former bad behavior. Her father used to write and draw picture books.

charaMessageList.message:
Unexcused absences AND fighting?
I can't ignore this!
My dad was a picture book author.
I wish I was like Haruka, kind and bright.
Arisa, you were late AGAIN!
These weird rumors are disturbing.
Thanks, you know just what to say.
My name? Why should I tell you?
Whew... All finished.
I'm glad you got my point.
This is because we worked as a team!
*Sigh* That was fast!

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A Magical Girl who lives by her daily divinations. If the fortune's good, she's very optimistic. If it's bad, she won't even go out to hunt Witches. She loves fortune-telling, but as her predictions always come true, she's forbidden to do it by other Magical Girls.

charaMessageList.message: My predictions are ALWAYS right!

No fortune-telling?!
But I neeed tooo!

My fortune was too bad today
to go outside!
Bad outcomes aren't my fault, okay?!
Yachiyo-senpai's house is so relaxing.
Morning is for milk and fortune-telling!
I HATE Kanagi!
I'm good enough to win without reading the future!
I knew this was going to happen!
I probably could've handled this by myself.
Even the enemies didn't see THAT coming!

chara.description: A Magical Girl who serves as the mascot (Uwasa) of Chelation Land. She spends her time completely relaxed, protecting the theme park that rids its visitors of all worries. Her suggestions for the food court menu impressed all the other Uwasa.

charaMessageList.message: Welcome to Chelation Land!
No need to go back to Mikazuki Villa.

I'm sure Dad's upset but...
it's gotta be this way.

Hmm... What food and merch
should we stock...

Don't you wish you had
a mane like mine?

You don't have to try
to be happy here!
All right! It's time to fuse!
Everyone can exit the venue now!
All you need to do is go with the flow!
Hey, now it's time to chill out!
I can feel safe here.

saleItem.name: Magia Chip
saleItem.description: Can be exchanged in the Shop for special Items

chara.description: A gossip-generating Magical Girl who photographs everything for posterity, good or bad. Even though she is feared for uncovering school problems and scandals, people enjoy her articles. The "Kitty Cat Diary" she makes as a pastime is her most popular column.

charaMessageList.message:
Evidence matters when you want
someone to believe you.
I didn't let that shot get away from me!
It's my policy not to post things online.
Ha ha! It's your fault for getting caught!
I think you'll be today's kitty cat.
How much more must I suffer?
At the very least I want to be rid of this suffering.
This will make a good article.
I've found the evidence! Now no one can argue with me.
It's your fault for getting caught. It wouldn't hurt to remember that.
I hope my work is helping people.

charaMessageList.message: みたまがやべぇのか…カメラがやべぇのか…
サーイエッサー
プライドとかねぇの？
ひいい追んだされるうぅう
オオセノママニ
カメラねぇ…流行ってんのか？
どうだ！マギレポのオレもやるだろ！
ガンガンやってやったぜ！@作戦とかわかんねぇしな！
腹減ったな…肉食いに行こうぜ！
へへっ！敵なしだぜ！

chara.description: A masked Magical Girl who fights in the shadows for the English in the Hundred Years' War. The second sister of three, and like her mother, adores her family. This love does not spill over to her enemies, though. For nothing excites her more than a strong opponent, it's what she lives for.

charaMessageList.message: Come out, come out, wherever you are♪
Now THIS is music to my ears!

Oh, I've been WAITING for you,
girl in black!
The hell?! Why's this light so powerful?!

Time to have my fun with
that ebon-clad girl!
Heh...heh heh! Not bad!

You're the first to have muddied
my Soul Gem!
Any complaints?
Done already? You're barely worth playing with.
Now you, you're fun. I had a GREAT time!
Well, that was a letdown.

This is my prayer, my wish...
Know that I'm by your side, Homura.
I have to go meet the others!

I will bear all of your

Magical Girls make

Don't give up, everyone!
I'll show you the way!
What a relief! Everyone's okay, right?
I won't give up hope.
You don't need to despair.
It's all right. Everything's going to be okay.

chara.description: A Magical Girl dressed in her own art, themed upon the base nature of mankind. In order to gather the energy necessary for this form, she warms those with frozen hearts in exchange for years off their life. charaMessageList.message: Let me warm your cold soul.
Ah haha! I, Alina, have found my beauty!

My final work will surely
come to fruition in an instant.
Behold my beautiful installation.
That idiota's stupid manga is so...
As a human, I too yearn for this beauty...
Perhaps I, Alina, should just change this world.
I went ahead and took a couple years off your life in exchange.
Ah, I can see it... It's just so thrilling...
For the sake of my art, I will one day engulf this world.
I want you to imagine a world in ruin.

I've already decided on

I was so excited wearing a kimono

Come to your Coordinator

What was everyone's first dream
of the year like?

See this ribbon?

Yep, hanetsuki is the best thing

Hmm... What should I write for

Isn't visiting the shrine on New Year's

Remember, happiness is

Look at everyone's kimonos!
They're so lovely!
There's some New Year's treats waiting for me at home!
I have to get home so I can eat some mochi!

We all have to get together and celebrate!

Augh! I'm staaarving!
Umika! Kaoru! Dinner's ready!

I know what they call me. "Assassin".
Why are you being so nice to me?

You learned the truth about
Magical Girls, didn't you?
Delivery complete.

Have you ever hated someone
enough to kill them?
I refuse to turn into a Witch!
Farewell.
I'm doing the right thing.
After all these attempts...the result's the same.
You can't win against me.

Qube...you were an angel?
But really... That banner's design is just awful.
Darc really is a selfless girl.
I'm a mercenary. I came here from Italy.

La Pucelle, they call her.
Darc's become quite popular.

That was close, but we won.
I guess that will do.
You must stay focused.

Miracles exist.
They have happened for me before.
I've wanted to meet you for a long time.
I'll continue to do what I can.
This is what I have the most faith in now!

That, too, was all because

It's just as Monsieur Angel told me.
It was no problem at all. I'm glad you're safe.
Phew... We won.

All flower petals must fall someday. But I refuse to.
If those girls want me to, I will fight.

Nooo, I can't! I can't let go of my float!

chara.description: A Magical Girl from medieval France known today as Jeanne d'Arc. Upon the death of her dear sister, Catherine, she resolved to save France from the brink of ruin. Simple, innocent, and trusting of others, she fondly refers to Qube (Kyubey) as "Monsieur Angel".

charaMessageList.message:
Miracles exist.
They have happened for me before.
I've wanted to meet you for a long time.
I'll continue to do what I can.
This is what I have the most faith in now!

That, too, was all because
I was not strong enough.
It's just as Monsieur Angel told me.
It was no problem at all. I'm glad you're safe.
Phew... We won.
Is everyone all right?!
Let's continue onward.
This is thanks to all of you.

charaMessageList.message: This is no dream.
Qube...you were an angel?
But really... That banner's design is just awful.
Darc really is a selfless girl.
I'm a mercenary. I came here from Italy.

La Pucelle, they call her.
Darc's become quite popular.
You're sure she is the one?
That was close, but we won.
I guess that will do.
You must stay focused.

I won't allow you to
extinguish the light!

This is my prayer, my wish...
Know that I'm by your side, Homura.
I have to go meet the others!

I will bear all of your
cursed destinies!

Magical Girls make
hopes and dreams come true!

Don't give up, everyone!
I'll show you the way!
What a relief! Everyone's okay, right?
I won't give up hope.
You don't need to despair.
It's all right. Everything's going to be okay.

I will not waver from this new path.
The justice I have put my faith in is here.

The tea I drink before battle is
a symbol of my determination.
My Florence is just darling, no?
I always wanted to use a tea set like this.
More people, more sweets to prepare...
I hope you are a little happier now.
This is the path I have laid out for you.
I will not allow anyone else to despair.
My wish is sacred.@I will allow no one to disparage it.

Her weapon is now a hanetsuki paddle, good for both close and long range attacks. Look closely at her paddle and you may see someone you recognize...

charaMessageList.message:
What was everyone's first dream
of the year like?

See this ribbon?
I got it tied especially for today!

Yep, hanetsuki is the best thing
to play on New Year's!

Hmm... What should I write for
my New Year's resolution?

Isn't visiting the shrine on New Year's
morning exciting?!

Remember, happiness is
what brings fortune!

Look at everyone's kimonos!
They're so lovely!
There's some New Year's treats waiting for me at home!
I have to get home so I can eat some mochi!
Looks like we'll be having a great year!
We all have to get together and celebrate!

ドーナツか？ドーナツじゃな？
ぱないの！これ、全部食べてもよいのか!?
あ、じゃあじゃあじゃあ、肩車肩車！
儂はの、死に場所を探しておったのじゃ
年季の違いというものを思い知らせてやる
服従の証として儂の頭を撫でてみよ！
かかっ、500年早いわ
天が許しても、儂が許さん！
また死に損ねてしまったか…

This may seem like a normal swimsuit, but it's actually her Magical Girl outfit - and the fishing rod is her weapon. She's no pro fisher, but she'll reel in even the hugest of fish if it's for her friends' sakes.

charaMessageList.message: Eek! Th-the waves splashed me...
What sea creature is your favorite?

Oww... The beach ball hit me
right in the face...

What comes to mind when you
think of the sea? I wonder...
I got all kinds of bait ready to fish with.
The sea is kind of scary at night...

The sound of the waves is so lovely.
I could listen to it forever...
I thought the fish might just take the bait and go.
I won't let the heat bring me down!
Now I can fish in peace!
I caught a huge one! And I didn't get hurt!

Her swimsuit is a Magical Girl outfit, so she can fight at any time, but she's equipped with a swim float in case of water battles as she's not a confident swimmer... She can also use it to escape in an emergency by twisting it like a screw.

charaMessageList.message: This swim float and I are inseparable!
Nooo, I can't! I can't let go of my float!

I'll try to swim at least 5 meters...
Nothing too crazy!

When I start swimming,
my whole mind goes blank in panic...

Hee hee...
Fish are really amazing, hee hee...

Ah, Tsuruno!
Keep hold of my hand!

There's no stopping me
if I have a kickboard!
I think...I managed to swim the whole way?
I wonder if there's some way I'll be able to swim...
I just have to keep pushing forward!
This feeling... Maybe I can swim now?!

charaMessageList.message: *Sniff, sniff* I know this smell... It's cheese!
Let me explain.
I just wanted to have cheese one more time.
Mmm... Cheddaaar!!!
So that's Mami Tomoe...
I'm going to eat that, and that, and that...
Oh, I'm so full... I'm taking a break...
We won! *Sigh* Good grief...
Now I can take my time eating this cheese!
Great! It's snack time!
Thanks for the food! I ate ALL of it!

chara.description: A Magical Girl dressed in her own art, themed upon the base nature of mankind. In order to gather the energy necessary for this form, she warms those with frozen hearts in exchange for years off their life. She also creates a death mask of her target, but that's an unrelated artistic pursuit of hers.

charaMessageList.message: Let me warm your cold soul.
Ah haha! I, Alina, have found my beauty!

My final work will surely
come to fruition in an instant.
Behold my beautiful installation.
That idiota's stupid manga is so...
As a human, I too yearn for this beauty...
Perhaps I, Alina, should just change this world.
I went ahead and took a couple years off your life in exchange.
Ah, I can see it... It's just so thrilling...
For the sake of my art, I will one day engulf this world.
I want you to imagine a world in ruin.

I've already decided on
my New Year's resolution.

I was so excited wearing a kimono
for the first time in the new year.

Come to your Coordinator
with your troubles♪

Butter and chocolate are a must
for sweet porridge♪

My first dream of the year was
a little strange this time.

I'm still young enough to receive money
on New Year's.
I'll buy some tangerines on my way home.
Yay♪ This is the card I needed!
Let's see what your fortune is... Oh no, "Terrible Luck".
What an auspicious way to start the new year♪

She repeatedly travels through time to save her friend from a fate of despair, preparing to defeat Walpurgisnacht without the aid of anyone else. She is from a different timeline than the Homura who found herself in Kamihama.

charaMessageList.message: This has nothing to do with you.
I swear it, I promise I'll save you!

I'll keep going back,
as many times as it takes.
I won't rely on anyone anymore.

Think about the people that care
deeply about you, too.
You see, I...I come from the future.

I don't care if I have to stay locked
in this endless maze.
I won't lose here!
A moment later and you would have been dead.
I will not stop fighting!
Are we done? I'm going up ahead.

charaMessageList.message: Oh, Momoko... What're you doing now?!
O-okay then... Become my servant!
I'm back to being alone...
Hehe...I love this concert DVD!
You're the one who started this fight!!
Even I hate me...
I told you! I'm not mad at you at all!!
This result seems quite natural to me, y'know?
You're not bad.
This is all thanks to you. Thank you.
It's definitely high five time!

charaMessageList.message:
｜I am happy as long as
those four are happy.｜

｜I must tell the others in
the book about this.｜

｜I know everything,
but I can't do anything.｜
｜Your first video upload...?｜

｜I can't restrain myself, not when
they need to be protected...｜

｜I want to go home...to my cherry
blossoms, and the people I love.｜

｜This is what I always wanted.
Isn't this great, everyone?｜
Now I know.... The outside world has these kinds of enemies.
This feeling building up inside me... I think it's happiness?
All flower petals must fall someday. But I refuse to.
If those girls want me to, I will fight.

charaMessageList.message: Is it wrong? I love idols!
Why'd I become a Magical Girl again…?

Call me a meddler if you want.
I can't just ignore this!
Me likin' somethin' like this…it's weird, huh?
Why've I grown into such a tough girl?
My team's well-balanced! Don't you think?
Aww...I always have the worst timing!
Neat and clean, just the way I like it!
It's all about team work, right?
I'm countin' on you to back me up from here on!
All of us are here! It was bound to turn out like this.

charaMessageList.message: Hmmm... Which ribbon should I wear?

I don't know much about this city...
It sure is strange, though...
I'm a Magical Girl…so I have to do this!
Is this…real?
Were you the one who was calling me?
Don't tell anyone in class, okay?
If I'm awesome, it'll all work out!
Thank goodness...it looks like we've won!
We did it! Great!
Yes! Looking good!
Phew... We made it through somehow!

Believe in yourself and fight.
The rest will follow.
Shall we have a tea break?
Being a Magical Girl is no walk in the park.

What dream do you intend to
make a reality?
What's going on in in this city…?
Oh… Could you beat me on equal footing?
One job done.
Phew... That was close!
All right then. Time for some tea.
Want to come to my place after this?

I became a Magical Girl to be with you.
I will use this power for you, and you alone.
Enough! Die and atone for your sins!
Oriko, quickly, give me orders!

What? You're done already?

Hey, that was actually kind of fun.
Don't underestimate my love.

you might as well be dead.

you shouldn't take me lightly, or else!

A sugary sweet drama can still be charming!
I'm so relieved everyone is okay.
I could've pushed myself harder back in the day.
I hope I'm not deceiving myself with this victory.

I wasn't really...checking to see

I'm...not a cat...

Serving customers is more
challenging than I thought.

Hurry up and choose
something to eat, Master.

I must study more anime,
manga, and games.

Our finances are in tatters.

THIS is why we've been persecuted

It's a huge pain when evil

We must set this town ablaze,

Welcome! Come have some
fresh-made fried chicken!

Here, have a sample of
some of our food!

This cute little Shiba Inu is
our doggy mascot, Mameji!

You'll know it's me
if you see this bright bandana!
I lose if I cry! I'm not lonely! I'm not!

I wish I didn't make that wish.
I wanted her to stay closeby.
Miss K... Miss K... *Sigh*
I'm growing up too, you know!
A smile is key, whether working at the shop or fighting Witches!

It's Ikumi, your most favoritest
Kamihama maid!

I'm gonna melt aaall your hearts
with my charm!

Let's play a game! Ready?
Look oveeer...there!

Hey!
Who just called me old-fashioned?!
My dream is made from two wishes...

I can't deny what happened
right in front of me...

I would resort to anything,
even if it's someone else's way out...
Waaaaaah! That was super scary!
I've gotta get back to the cafe, my show's about to start!
I won't die... Not until your dream comes true...

Too bad!
The universe is my only freedom.
Nemu's being stubborn again.
Did you know stars have a language too?

*Giggle* To think I can freely use
the radio telescope!

I wonder what my uncle saw
before he vanished...
I'm so amazing! Hee hee!
Yes, yes! I feel so charged up!
I think we worked hard. Good job.

The fate of Magical Girls,
and the choices we make.

finally taking a unified shape!

It was beyond a miracle that
I was discharged from the hospital.

My brother and I aren't close.
He's almost a stranger to me.

Magical Girls are isolated and lonely...

Let's leave our mark,
so that people know we were here.

You gave up on your story here, not me.

My creations are for everyone.

chara.description: A Magical Girl who is struggling to figure out what she can do to make everyone happy. She grew up knowing little of the outside, which is why she tries so hard to keep up with others. Skilled at finding the good in people, she dislikes no one. Touka and Nemu are her close friends, and Iroha is her sister.

charaMessageList.message: The outside world is amazing...
Stop, no more fighting!
My dream is to sing in the school chorus.

Living like this...
It's all I need to be happy.

I have to hurry and become
more independent!
I wonder what kind of adult I'll become?

Wow, I made my first friend
on the outside!
Hey Sis, I was able to beat them!
Yeah, my power's getting steadier now!
Thanks, little sparrow!
I can help now, I think.

chara.description: An introvert, this Magical Girl isn't good when it comes to people. Oppressed at both home and school, she hates the world. After her contract was made, she encountered something that changed her strange fate even further. Although eccentric, she loves animals.

charaMessageList.message: There, there! That's a good pet!
Hey, as long as we're havin' fun!
Ahaha! Who cares about that?
I'm gonna live however I feel like!
I don't have a reason. Do I really need one?
Hehe, I don't give a damn what happens!

The future is filled with possibility...
Haha...ahaha!
Wha? It's already over?
Huuuh, this wound up pretty nice!
I wanna have fun with the next one, too!
This feeling... Ah ha ha!

chara.description: A Magical Girl with a rather peculiar passion...Japanese swords. When katanas, or anything else she's interested in, comes up in conversation there's no stopping her. She also tours as a local-idol for the historically rich Mizuna.

charaMessageList.message: Oopsies! This is my "Gotta Get Better" pose!
I'm an idol...?
Eeeeeek! A g-g-ghost!!!

I'm gonna head to the art museum again
after class, as usual!
In 1560, the feudal lord Oda Nobunaga...
I hope you'll keep looking after me!
You think I'm ditzy? Like, an airhead character? Huh?
Victory is mine...so there!
I sang sooo much!
That's one issue handled!
I am forever indebted to you... Pfft, just kidding!

chara.description: A timid Magical Girl who wished to protect Madoka. She turns back time repeatedly in an attempt to prevent Madoka from becoming a Witch. Now she searches for a new hope in Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message: I... I want to redo my meeting with Madoka!
I want to be someone who can protect her...
Where am I? What is this place...
I'll never, ever give up!
Which weapon should I use this time?
Let's do our best together from now on!
I'll save Madoka for sure this time!
I did it? I did it!
Phew...it's over now...
I got through it...somehow...
Did I fight well…?
